Producer: Ellen Barkin, Pamela Fielder, Johnny Lin, Michael Nardelli, Salli Newman, Celine Rattray, Todd Traina
Rating: R (Sexual References|Pervasive Language|Brief Graphic Nudity|Teen Drug//Alcohol Abuse)
Synopsis: A woman (Ellen Barkin) attends her son's wedding at the estate of her ex-husband (Thomas Haden Church).
Title: Another Happy Day
